rooms.description: A welcoming space that adheres to Vastu principles ensuring a positive energy flow. The entrance is aligned with the north-east direction.
Spacious and open Scandinavian design style living area with minimalistic furniture and abundant natural light, located towards the south-west to maintain balance.
A comfortable dining space integrated within the living area; positioned in a central location for ease of access and Vastu compliance.
Modern Scandinavian kitchen with functional layout ensuring efficient work triangle and adherence to Vastu guidelines by placing the entrance opposite the stove.
Small washroom for guests located conveniently near the dining area, following Vastu principles of avoiding direct alignment with main rooms.

openings.description: Main entry door placed in the north-east direction as per Vastu to invite positive energy.
Large window offering ample natural light and scenic views, ensuring a harmonious Scandinavian aesthetic.
Window aligned with the east to maximize morning sunlight in accordance with Vastu guidelines.

rooms.description: Primary bedroom designed with a Scandinavian aesthetic using natural materials and light colors. Positioned in the north-west corner for peaceful energy as per Vastu.
Secondary bedroom that maintains minimalistic design principles and sufficient space, located on the south-east side to maintain balance.
Third bedroom with functional layout and Scandinavian simplicity, placed adjacent to the master bedroom for familial closeness.

A dedicated entertainment space incorporating state-of-the-art audio-visual equipment and ambient lighting, designed in a Scandinavian style with Vastu guidelines ensuring placement away from direct sunlight to optimize viewing experience.
A balcony attached to the master bedroom offering outdoor space and natural ventilation as per Vastu recommendations.

openings.description: Window designed for optimum light and air flow, aligning with the peaceful energies of the north-west.
Strategically placed window to allow controlled natural lighting without interfering with screen visibility.
